title: Conference Finals Preview, NBA Title Odds, Coaching Fits | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Conference Finals Preview, NBA Title Odds, Coaching Fits | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
A big week of WHAT'S BURNIN is here as the guys preview the conference finals as the Bucks take on the Hawks in the East and the Clippers face the Suns in the West. Plus, Matt and Stak discuss the best coaching fits for teams searching for a new leader.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
